name: Simple App Changelogs
author: peti446

sections.description:
With this Plugin you can display project related changelogs on your WordPress Site with some nice and simple animations.

This could be very useful, if you want to make the user aware of each version changes and/or you have serveral project to display either on the same page or in different ones!.
sections.installation:
1. Download plugin through the wordpress included plugin downloader.
  2. Activate plugin in plugin tab.
  3. Go to the plugin tab.
  4. Create a project, and click on View/Edit Versions.
  5. Create one ore more Versions!.
  6. Put the shortcode [appchangelog projectID=ID OF PROJECT HERE] in one of your posts or pages (To find out the id just go to the projects page, on the table there will be a value (ID)).
  7. Now you have a changelog on the page :D!
sections.faq:
Can I edit the css and js code?

Sure you can, these are located in the assets folder from the plugin, hoever make a copy of you custom code, because for now custom css and js will get overwritten after each update D: (Will add an fature in the future to do custom css without the need to worry after each update)!

short_description: A Plugin to display a Changelog from an App, Plugin or anything else of what you want to have a changelog off!.
